data.text:
"Very truly I tell you, whoever hears my word and believes him who sent me has eternal life and will not be judged but has crossed over from death to life."

John 5:24 NIV

Our first grandbaby is on the way! 

Christie and I couldn’t be more excited for our firstborn son, Jim, and his wonderful wife, Aubrey. God has truly blessed our family. A baby boy is coming in August 2026! 💙👶 https://t.co/W245BZGaC5

Nearly 80% of the House voted for @DHSgov funding. Now, Senate Dems are upset about the *same* bipartisan bill they approved just days ago!

And yes—it already has funding for body cameras and training. We’re not going to handcuff law enforcement for a useless political exercise.

Senate Democrats want to turn America into one big “sanctuary city.” Not going to happen.

Also, requiring ID? Priceless. https://t.co/YrJ1PwryMA
@ScottPresler Been on the original Save Act since Sept 2024, but the updated version from @SenMikeLee is a no-brainer. Election integrity is a key national security issue.

Just re-signed my support for the updated SAVE America Act to require documented proof of citizenship and a valid ID at the ballot box. 

This is a 90/10 issue. Let’s get it done.
Sat down with the man himself today. Talked all things China. Stay tuned. @mboyle1 @BreitbartNews https://t.co/hRXFJE6LYk https://t.co/UhVg1GhVsC

We just surprised Byrch, a high school senior from Choctaw with news he’s been appointed to the @af_academy!

Each year, we nominate highly-qualified students for appointment to our U.S. Service Academies. It’s an honor and a privilege to be part of this process. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/UQryrw20v2
